laml_libs.Count_model.CharMtrx module¶

class laml_libs.Count_model.CharMtrx.CharMtrx(data_struct, alphabet)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to represent the character matrix .. attribute:: K

the number of cassettes

J¶

the number of sites per cassette

data_struct¶

a mapping: cell_name -> (cassette -> cassette_state). The data type is “dictionary of lists of cassette_states”

alphabet¶

an instance of class Alphabet

NOTE: We will use “cassette_state” and “allele” interchangeably throughout

get(w, k)[source]¶
Get the cassette state (i.e. allele) of cell w at cassette k

w: a cell name/label k: a cassette index

return: an allele, which is represented by a tuple of self.J elements

get_cell_names()[source]¶

Get all cell names

is_missing(w, k, missing_symbol='?')[source]¶

Check if cassette k of cell w is missing w: a cell name/label k: a cassette index
